articles.description: Following the media report, YES Bank shares have gained 8.35% to hit a day's high of ₹22.75 on the NSE. The stock had fallen 12.8% in the previous three trading sessions.

articles.title: Kites Senior Care raises Rs 45 Cr in Series A round - Entrackr
articles.description: Agetech startup Kites Senior Care has raised Rs 45 crore ($5.4 million) in its Series A round led by Ranjan Pai
